title: A bunch of my recently used apps are refusing to open for no reason
content:
I have a game that I play on a relatively regular basis. It opened at 4:00 and 1 hour later it looked like it would open and then would crash. I tried other apps. Some would open and some would almost open and then crash. I tried uninstalling audible and reinstalling it which worked for a short time and then about 45 minutes later I tried to use it and it half opened and then crashed. 

I haven't had any updates that I'm aware of and nothing changed from the time that the phone was working fine until now. I'm connected to Wi-Fi, battery is over 90%, and I've freed up enough storage space to have 14 gigabytes free which is 78%. 

I have rebooted the phone multiple times And I have tried to force stop the apps in question.
